text:
@AP She's doing right thing.
So the hell what?! EVERYONE (or the MAJORITY), like the damn flu, will evetually get the sh*t. Get over it. I've NEVER taken flu shot, yet have NEVER had it & I anticipate same will occur with Covid19, but will prob be asympt & build up antibodies.

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks
